QuestData.Title: Ancestor's Memory
QuestData.Description: I believe that you should know the price of the lives you take.$B$BSo before I will help you find Ner'zhul, you must understand why he joined the Iron Horde.$B$BIn a cave beneath this village is an artifact that we call the Ancestral Totem. On it is carved the names of every Shadowmoon clan member since its founding.$B$BThe opening of the cave lies directly south. I will meet you there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Ancestor's Totem in the cave beneath Exile's Rise.
QuestData.CompletionText: You must understand a man's life before taking it.
QuestData.RewardText: We will find new traditions. My people will become something... new.
